meanings.definition: Affected with nausea; inclined to vomit.
meanings.sent1: She felt nauseated after the roller coaster ride.
meanings.sent2: The nauseated child couldn't eat anything.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating broccoli made her feel nauseated.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the gruesome movie scene left her feeling nauseated.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the garbage was so strong that it made her nauseated.

meanings.sent1: The spoiled food nauseated him instantly.
meanings.sent2: The strong smell of the chemicals nauseated the workers.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating snails might nauseate some people.
meanings.sent4: The constant spinning of the amusement park ride nauseated the girl.
meanings.sent5: The bitter taste of the medicine nauseated the patient.
